sourcesContent: A brilliant Christmas! 私","A Christmas lunch like no other! ･Ⅸ
A tasty roast! 脂","Such tasty turkey! 欺

Nobody can stop talking about how tasty your turkey was. It was perfectly cooked!","You cooked the turkey perfectly. Everyone said it was brilliant!","This might be the best Christmas ever thanks to your turkey!","The turkey was out of this world! 噫This is the best Christmas ever!","Your turkey was so good, your family want you to become a professional chef!","You cooked the turkey for exactly the right time! 笨","Jamie Oliver just called... he said your turkey was perfect! 糟","Your turkey was just brilliant. Everyone had seconds!","Cooking a turkey well isn't easy - but you did it excellently!","Turkey is usually a dry meat. But not today - you cooked it brilliantly!","Wow! You roasted the best turkey ever!","You make roasting look easy! It was a tasty bird.","Perfectly roasted! The meat simply melts in your mouth.","Perfectly cooked! Succulent and flavoursome.","Perfectly cooked! It's the best meal your family's had all year!","Your turkey was brilliant. There were no leftovers because everyone had seconds!","A lovely roast. Your family are happy and you deserve a rest!","Roasting comes easy to you! This Christmas's turkey was perfect!","The yule bird was perfectly roasted. The taste was incredible.","Congratulations! You made the tastiest turkey anyone's ever eaten!","You roasted your turkey for the perfect time and the whole family loved it."] return ( <>
